# TaggingScope enumeration

Classification of a range of OneNote pages.

```csharp
public enum TaggingScope
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| CurrentNote | `0` | The OneNote page currently viewed |
| SelectedNotes | `1` | The range of OneNote pages currently selected |
| CurrentSection | `2` | The OneNote section to which the currently viewed page belongs to. |
